                       java.util.List<TLogParser.Event> events,
                       java.util.ArrayList<java.io.File> photos)
        Asynchronous method to geotag a list of images using a list of Events as coordinate data. Warning: this copies data to external storage
        Parameters:
        rootDir - File
        events - List list of events to geotag photos.
        photos - List list of files of photos to geotag.
